title: Roy Jones Jr. | Ep 126 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Roy Jones Jr. | Ep 126 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Boxing legend Roy Jones Jr. joins a special episode of ALL THE SMOKE as he sits down with Matt & Stak. Jones Jr. opens up about his hall-of-fame career, discusses his fight vs. Mike Tyson in 2020, and talks about the new generation of boxing stars.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
